short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension to convert decimal numbers for Example: dec No(15) = oct(17),bin(1111),hex(F).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension for network category. It will help the users to convert decimal number to binary , octal , hexadecimal number also it will show you IP as decimal and binary number, There is option for network & prefix to make user deal with network mask and prefix easy.

In a new update 1.5.2v there are some new features that can help users for example when you enter the value inside element so it will change from element to next element to help users to deal with me extension easy.
